name: 1 of a Kind in Home Care and Medical Services LLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: 1 of a Kind in Home Care and Medical Services LLC is a Case Management provider based in Fort Smith, AR. From 2023-03 through 2024-12, this provider received $368K in Medicaid payments across 4K claims serving 989 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 2.1× the national median for T1016 (T1016), at $102 per claim vs. the median of $50, placing them above the 75th percentile.
98% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: T1016 (T1016). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Spending more than doubled from $107K in 2023 to $261K in 2024 (145% growth).

narrative.title: Important Context
items: This provider appears to operate as a fiscal intermediary or management organization, processing payments on behalf of many individual caregivers. High aggregate billing is expected for this type of entity.
